titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the fourth week in April as Every Kid Healthy Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
4/13/2015--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of Every Kid Healthy Week.
Recognizes the importance of promoting healthy lifestyles and healthy learning environments for all children.
